patterns.mediator

Mediator pattern utilities.

Provides a lightweight mediator abstraction used to centralize communication between game components (UI, states, structures, points system). The mediator reduces direct coupling by routing events and coordinating responses.

class patterns.mediator.GameMediator(gameManager)

Bases: Mediator

Central game mediator.

Coordinates interactions between the HUD, game states, structures, and the points system. It exposes registration for components and a high-level notify method used by components to signal events.

notify(sender, event, data=None)

Procesa eventos y coordina respuestas entre componentes

Parameters:

  • sender (object)

  • event (str)

  • data (Dict[str, Any])

Return type:

None

register_component(name, component)

Registra un componente para que pueda comunicarse

Parameters:

  • name (str)

  • component (object)

Return type:

None

class patterns.mediator.Mediator

Bases: ABC

Base interface for mediator implementations.

Concrete mediators implement notify to react to events sent by components and to coordinate actions across subsystems.

abstractmethod notify(sender, event, data=None)

Recibe notificación de un componente y coordina respuestas

Parameters:

  • sender (object) – Objeto que envía la notificación

  • event (str) – Tipo de evento

  • data (Dict[str, Any]) – Datos adicionales del evento

Return type:

None

class patterns.mediator.StructureMediator

Bases: Mediator

Mediator specialized for structure-to-structure communication.

Routes produced items across conveyors and notifies connected structures about events like production, consumption, or upgrades.

notify(sender, event, data=None)

Procesa eventos entre estructuras

Parameters:

  • sender (object)

  • event (str)

  • data (Dict[str, Any])

Return type:

None
